name: Dedicated Targeting Core
desc:
Increases the range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s/%s for cruisers/capital ships.

Can not be installed on a frigate or a destroyer, and can not work in conjunction with Integrated Targeting Unit.

Most combat ships install either an Integrated Targeting Unit or a Dedicated Targeting Core, with the exception of more specialized variants.
short: Increases weapon range, more so for larger ships.
sModDesc: Increases the range bonus to %s for cruisers and %s for capital ships.

name: Combat sensor package
desc:
This ship carries an unusually powerful sensor package for it's size.

Increases the range of Ballistic and Energy weapons by %s.

Prevents the installation of Integrated Targeting Unit.
short: Increases weapon range, more than usual

name: Bomber Command Center
desc: Equips every fighter of the Carrier with an ECCM package, reducing the chance for missiles launched by fighters to be affected by flares by %s, as well as increasing their top speed by %s, their maneuverability by %s and improving their guidance

name: Fine-tuned Bay
desc:
The fine-tuned autoforges and facilities of this carrier grant a wide array of benefits to it's strikecraft

Fighters launched by this ship have their top speed increased by %s and their maneuverability by %s.

Furthermore their hull integrity is increased by %s and their armor rating by %s, as well as reducing EMP damage taken by %s.

Fighters are also replaced %s faster.
